plugin.name: feeds
plugin.author: Marc Palmer
plugin.title: Render RSS/Atom feeds with a simple builder
plugin.description: This plugin adds a feedType and feedVersion parameters to the render method of controllers, which if passed a valid feed type such as "rss" or "atom" and a version will expect a closure to be passed with render, which will render a feed using a custom builder. The FeedBuilder used for this accepts entry and content nodes, any properties of which can be set within the builder. These are beans from the ROME API so all properties there should work.
